column2: "A new Matter Board has been formed. The present teeters between reality and truth."
"I and We trust in the ends that you must realize."
"You must trust in yourself, for what you have done and what you have yet to do."
"Huh?! That's completely different from what I expected! The weapon you repaired has been stolen!"
"Oh, I'm sorry... You gave the weapon back to Second to celebrate her recovering her memory, didn't you?"
"Also, it seems that Ulc got caught up in the battle against the Darkers, and ended up getting killed."
"Was that part of Xion's calculations too? I suppose it must be important for something else to happen."
"Um, still, the situation so far doesn't look good. I can't see any sign of good things ahead. I wonder what will have to be done, and by who..."
